sections.heading: for charter; hearing; how conducted
sections.text: The hearing required by section 8-3016 shall be conducted under the Administrative Procedure Act and shall comply with the requirements of the act.SourceLaws 2021, LB649, ยง 17;Laws 2023, LB92, ยง 31.Cross ReferencesAdministrative Procedure Act, see section 84-920.

8-3017.Application for charter; hearing; how conducted.

The hearing required by section 8-3016 shall be conducted under the Administrative Procedure Act and shall comply with the requirements of the act.

SourceLaws 2021, LB649, ยง 17;Laws 2023, LB92, ยง 31.

Cross ReferencesAdministrative Procedure Act, see section 84-920.
